title: Did Mike Sherky in Michigan suggest that the Capitol riot be in an exquisite video?
subtitle: He blamed the local Sherky for pushing false conspiracy theories.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: :: During a lunch with the leaders of the Republican Party in Hillsdale County on February 3, 2021, the majority leader of the Michigan State Senate, Mike Sherky, proposed that the January 6 riots in the United States Capitol Building were a "terror."
